meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Charlie Penrod Kristin Anderson Judy Shewmake Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6031.

td.p: Charlie Penrod, an assistant professor of law from Natchitoches, Louisiana
Kristin Anderson, a director of communications from Seattle, Washington
Judy Shewmake, a retired middle school history teacher from Murfreesboro, Tennessee (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,801)

tr.td: COUNTRY NICKNAMES
HOLLYWOOD UGLY
2010 20th ANNIVERSARIES
THAT'S GREAT, PETER THE GREAT!
RHYMIN' FRED
(Kyra Sedgwick: I'm Kyra Sedgwick. I play Deputy Chief Brenda Leigh Johnson on The Closer. Come along with me on...)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_4_2', 'clue_J_4_2_stuck', '(Judy: What is six feet?)
(Charlie: What is five feet?)
[Judy attempts to ring in again]
(Alex: Judy, you can\'t ring in again.)
(Judy: I\'m sorry!)
(Alex: Kristin?)
(Kristin: What is four feet?)
(Alex: No! You guys were going in the wrong direction. He was very tall. He was almost [*] tall.)

seven feet

JudyKristinCharlie
Triple Stumper
')
